duties_responsibilities.duty: Support Store leadership in Visual Merchandising planning and execution.
Implement all aspects of merchandise visual presentation consistently according to Corporate standards and resources.
Drive brick & mortar sales by creating inspiring moments through visual storytelling and mannequin presentation.
Elevate store visual presentations in all areas of the store.
Take proper care of all visual components, graphics, tools, and supplies.
Conduct weekly store walks with the Store Manager focused on visual priorities for the week.
Communicate regularly with Store associates and executives to align to company priorities.
Effectively use company resources to plan, communicate, and share information with Store associates and executives.
Acknowledge and assist customers in all areas of the store.
Build trust with the customer to solve their shopping needs.
Be a savings consultant to help customers save with a Kohl’s Card.
Limited travel to support new store openings.
Maintain prompt and regular attendance as set by the company.
Learn and comply with all company policies, procedures, standards, and guidelines.
Receive, understand, and proactively respond to direction from supervisors/managers and other company personnel.
Operate and communicate on multiple frequency devices, handheld scanners, and other technology equipment as directed.
Perform work in accordance with the physical requirements section.
